statements: SELECT sale_id, product_name, color, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT color, style, sale_id, quantity_sold, product_name FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, sale_date, style, sale_id FROM sales_data;
SELECT style, sale_date, color, quantity_sold, product_name FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, style, color, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, style, color FROM sales_data WHERE color = 'Red' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, style, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE style LIKE '%T-shirt%' ORDER BY sale_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sale_date DESC, quantity_sold DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE color IN ('Blue', 'Green') ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE color='Blue'
SELECT style, color, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT style FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, style, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name, style
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE style = 'Casual' AND color = 'Blue';
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT season, AVG(trend_score) AS average_score FROM style_trends GROUP BY season;
SELECT product_name, color, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT style, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY style HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM styles_data WHERE category='Fashion';
SELECT color_name, product_name FROM colors_data ORDER BY color_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT s.product_name, c.color_name FROM sales_data s INNER JOIN colors_data c ON s.product_name = c.product_name
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT product_name, category, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data s INNER JOIN styles_data st ON s.product_name = st.product_name GROUP BY product_name, category
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT style_name, product_name FROM product_styles ORDER BY style_name DESC;
SELECT color_name, hex_value FROM product_colors WHERE hex_value LIKE '#%';
SELECT season, trending_style_id, popular_color_id FROM seasonal_trends WHERE season = 'Winter';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, style_name, color_name FROM product_styles ps JOIN product_colors pc ON ps.product_name = pc.product_name WHERE pc.hex_value = '#FF0000';

SELECT ps.product_name, pc.color_name, st.season FROM product_styles ps JOIN product_colors pc ON ps.product_name = pc.product_name JOIN seasonal_trends st ON ps.style_id = st.trending_style_id ORDER BY st.season ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT season FROM seasonal_trends WHERE season IN ('Summer', 'Winter', 'Fall');
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products;
SELECT style_name, style_type FROM Styles ORDER BY style_name DESC;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM Colors WHERE color_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 3 AND quantity > 5;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price < 100.00 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT style_name, style_type FROM Styles WHERE style_type = 'Casual' ORDER BY style_name ASC;
